titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the requirements for verifying a small business concern owned and controlled by a veteran.
To amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the requirements for verifying a small business concern owned and controlled by a veteran.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary: Prohibits the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA), in determining the eligibility of a small business for inclusion in a VA-maintained database of small businesses owned and controlled by veterans and the veteran owners thereof, from considering: (1) the work schedule of the veteran owner; or (2) whether the small business sells or otherwise conducts business with respect to more than one product line.
